bibl.title: Sagalassos and Alexandria. Avec résumé en turc.
bibl.note: Sagalassos and its potter's quarter. - 2. Alexandria, the trade capital. - 3. Exchange of goods: 3.1. Ceramics; - 3.2. Other goods. - 4. Exchange of persons. - Focuses on Sagalassos red slip ware found at Egyptian sites [Alexandria, Memphis, the Fayoum, Hermopolis Magna and Nubian Pharas] and places these in a wider context of trade and exchange patterns.

bibl.title: Les céramiques en Anatolie aux époques hellénistique et romaine. Actes de la Table Ronde d'Istanbul, 22-24 mai 1996

bibl.seg: POBLOME Jeroen and Marc WAELKENS, Sagalassos and Alexandria. Avec résumé en turc.

Catherine ABADIE-REYNAL (Éd.), Les céramiques en Anatolie aux époques hellénistique et romaine. Actes de la Table Ronde d'Istanbul, 22-24 mai 1996 = Varia Anatolica. XV (Istanbul, 2003) pp. 179-191 et pll. CIV-CVIII; - 224.

Sagalassos and its potter's quarter. - 2. Alexandria, the trade capital. - 3. Exchange of goods: 3.1. Ceramics; - 3.2. Other goods. - 4. Exchange of persons. - Focuses on Sagalassos red slip ware found at Egyptian sites [Alexandria, Memphis, the Fayoum, Hermopolis Magna and Nubian Pharas] and places these in a wider context of trade and exchange patterns.
